Text:
Newage? Krautrock(!)
Thanks for the upload... Tangerine Dream the kraut superstars, Can and Cluster not forgot...
Thanks for the upload, but this was sadly some really boring TD music. Is this the future TD? I hope not. But thanks again for letting me realize this without buying the CD first and regretting it.

Well, everyone got a different taste...
... for me, this is THE album of 2007. Can't get enough of it!! ;)

a Syd inspired TD release.
MUST HAVE
thanks ever so much
Please seed! I can't find this anywhere, I'll love you forever if someone will keep this going! THanks!
